name: Streaming & Multimedia
description: Sector template for network streaming and multimedia delivery patents.
contextDescription: Streaming multimedia patents cover network-based media delivery. Key areas include adaptive streaming (HLS, DASH), media transport, and QoE optimization. High-value targets include Netflix, YouTube, Disney+, and all OTT providers. This sector overlaps with VIDEO_STREAMING but focuses on network transport aspects.
scoringGuidance: Adaptive bitrate (ABR) patents target all streaming services.
Low-latency streaming patents target live events and gaming.
CDN optimization patents target Akamai, Cloudflare, Fastly.
Media transport patents (RTP, RTSP) are broadly applicable.
Buffer management patents improve playback quality.

questions.question: What streaming function does this cover (ABR, transport, buffering, CDN)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Identify the streaming function and its importance.

questions.question: Is this relevant to OTT platforms (Netflix, YouTube, Disney+)?
questions.reasoningPrompt: OTT platforms are high-value targets with massive scale.

questions.question: Is this relevant to live streaming or low-latency delivery?
questions.reasoningPrompt: Low-latency live streaming is a differentiating capability.
